These guidelines were designed by interdisciplinary healthcare teams to provide safe maternal care based on best 
evidence and our national context and are believed to be accurate and current at the time of release. These guidelines 
are intended to provide general advice and guidance and must not be solely relied upon as a substitute for assessing 
the individual needs of each mother. They must be used in conjunction with a
